name: Type Up
description:
Choose a character, a setting, and start typing. Want different characters? Add your own!

Type the words as they appear on screen as fast as you can. When time's up you can see the results of your work in a quirky way. Each word you type also gives you points that can be spend to change the game up for the next time. If that's too easy the game has a hard mode that gives you more points for longer and more challenging words.

The game also allows you to import characters that you can bundle up with the free version of unity, then drag and drop and play with whatever character you like. A tutorial on how to do this will be made available before release so make sure to follow if you want to be notified.
